body: This is relevant to some experiment retention queries I've been looking into. The start date can be inferred from the first time a ping with an experiment slug arrives in the pipeline, but the end date is a bit harder. It sounds like I can use the workaround with a combination of `is_enabled` and `last_updated` field, but it would be useful to have this exposed generally.
